title: Design and Operational Strategies for Asynchronous Online Case-Based Discussions

context.prior_knowledge: Basic language proficiency and understanding of job-related fundamental concepts
context.additional_context: A language education course for current professionals combining case-based learning and asynchronous discussions in project-based environments

learning_goals: Learners can derive language utilization strategies by analyzing cases reflecting real-world job situations.
Learners improve communication skills by exchanging peer feedback at least three times through asynchronous discussions.
Learners can write self-reflection reports based on their discussion participation and qualitative analysis.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
